[Toughness](/Feats.aspx?ID=855) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 268 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

---

You can withstand more punishment than most before succumbing. Increase your maximum Hit Points by your level. The DC of [recovery checks](/Rules.aspx?ID=375) is equal to 9 + your [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) condition value.
